```{r}
library(data.table)
library(shiny)
```
```{r}
    plotOutput("plot", width="600px")
```

```{r}
#| context: server
x  <- data.table::fread("cms_part_d_01OCT2022_30SEPT2023_data.csv")
y  <- x[ , .N, by=decision]
    output$plot <- renderPlot(
                    barplot(y$N, names.arg=y$decision, 
                    main="CMS Decisions: Part D, 01 OCT 2022 -- 30 SEPT 2023"), 
                              res = 96)
```
